participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, with a rebellious streak and a passion for music.
participant_1.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.

participant_2.name: Rajesh
participant_2.personality: Practical and family-oriented, valuing hard work and enjoying simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i am a plumber. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. my wife and kids are the best. i have three children.
